thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 35 of 61
thread.title: Max

author: Max
title: Max
text:
SSENSE has the best customer service I've ever seen.
They reply to e-mails within 1-2 hours and dispatched a hoodie which I bought of them around 1 hour after the order was placed.
It arrived within 2 days, which is incredibly fast considering that it comes from Canada.
Also it is more than excellent, that SSENSE does all the paperwork and customs for you.
I definetly reccomend SSENSE to anyone!
